title: Monster
description: Story of a doctor who got accused of a murder that he didn't commit
author: Naoki Urasawa

title: Berserk
description: A dark, gritty tale of a lone swordsman's quest for revenge and survival.
author: Kentaro Miura

title: Naruto
description: A story of a young Ninja who wants to be Hokage!
author: Masashi Kishimoto
